instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MacBook Air 13  early 2015 820-00165 is slow
threads.message:
Hello everyone,

I got this Mac and it is on the slow side. Internet diagnostic feature shows error codes PFM006 and PPN001. Board looks clean. I replaced I/O board, nothing changed. 

Any ideas?

threads.title: MacBook Air 13  early 2015 820-00165 is slow
threads.message: Check which sensor is failing. I will send you a DM

threads.title: MacBook Air 13  early 2015 820-00165 is slow
threads.message: Running the MRI test shows yellow exclamation mark at "Apple Diagnostics", red exclamation marks at "Battery", "Fan" and "Sensors" and it hangs at the phase "Testing sensors" ...

threads.title: MacBook Air 13  early 2015 820-00165 is slow
threads.message: Let it sit and see if it finishes. I have not seen MRI hang like that yet. Once it finishes you should be able to click the tiles with battery/sensor/fan etc. and it will show which sensor exactly is failing.
